name: terracotta shores blanket
notes:
the terracotta shores blanket pattern features an easy-to-learn stitch that works up quickly and beautifully. written in 4 sizes (baby - twin), this blanket is perfect for baby gifts or for your own couch! 

i used hobby lobby ilty in the following shades:

* white
* linen
* cherry blossom
* river ripple

yarn amounts vary based on which size you make, but that information is included in the pattern!
